title: WHOLEMEAL SPAGHETTI AGLIO E OLIO
directions: Peel and slice the garlic razor thin.
Boil a large pot of water.
Add spaghetti to boiling water (you can salt but no oil, cook approx. 2 minutes less than indicated.
To a frying pan, add the olive oil and turn on heat.
Fry until the garlic becomes a little brown, then add half a cup of the boiling pasta water.
Add the anchovies and crush them a little to help them dissolve.
Season with a little salt and cracked pepper.
Strain your spaghetti (keep a little water on side just incase sauce runs dry).
Add spaghetti back to the hot frying pan.
Add some grated Parmesan cheese, mix well.
Plate up and top with more grated Parmesan.
ingredients: 60ml - ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
